{"id":1274958632,"question_id":3405,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1717308032,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"69 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1274958632/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count the Number of Special Characters II","memory":"23.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int numberOfSpecialChars(string word) {\n        \n        vector<int> dict_lower(26,-1);\n        vector<int> dict_upper(26,-1);\n        for(int i=0; i<word.length(); i++) {\n            if(word[i]>='a' & word[i]<='z') \n                dict_lower[word[i]-'a']=i; //record the last location.\n            else {\n                if(dict_upper[word[i]-'A']==-1)\n                    dict_upper[word[i]-'A'] = i;\n            }\n        };\n\n        int ans = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<26; i++) {\n            if(dict_lower[i]>=0 & dict_upper[i]>=0 & dict_lower[i] < dict_upper[i])\n                ans++;\n        };\n\n        return ans; \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-the-number-of-special-characters-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
